summary: The Coast Guard provides maritime safety, security, and environmental protection. Since 9/11, its roles and responsibilities have grown to include national security and disaster response. The Coast Guard recently told Congress that it doesn’t have enough people to meet its mission demands. However, we found the service doesn’t have a complete picture of the workforce needed for meeting its mission demands. For example, it only...
title: Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Evaluate the Effectiveness of Organizational Changes and Determine Workforce Needs
